title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: Bug 114903 Default values are not shown in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
OB: When accessing the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog, the default values for the report parameters are not displayed.
EB: The default values for report parameters should be visible in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create several report parameters and set default values for them. 2. Drag the report parameters to the layout. 3. Access the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog and observe that the default values are not shown.
